summary.span: 表示用于填充 和更新 SQL Server 数据库的一组数据命令和一个数据库连接。

span.span: Represents a set of data commands and a database connection that are used to fill the and update a SQL Server database.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 作为 检索和保存数据的和 SQL Server 之间的桥梁。The , serves as a bridge between a and SQL Server for retrieving and saving data. 通过映射提供此桥 ，这将更改中的数据 以匹配数据源中的数据，并对数据源 使用适当的 transact-sql 语句，从而更改数据源中的数据以与中的数据相匹配。The provides this bridge by mapping , which changes the data in the to match the data in the data source, and , which changes the data in the data source to match the data in the , using the appropriate Transact-SQL statements against the data source. 更新按行执行。The update is performed on a by-row basis. 对于每个已插入的、已修改的和已删除的行，该 方法将确定在其 (`Insert` 、 `Update` 或) 上执行的更改类型 `Delete` 。For every inserted, modified, and deleted row, the method determines the type of change that has been performed on it (`Insert`, `Update`, or `Delete`). 根据更改的类型，将 `Insert` `Update` 执行、或 `Delete` 命令模板，以将修改后的行传播到数据源。Depending on the type of change, the `Insert`, `Update`, or `Delete` command template executes to propagate the modified row to the data source. 当 填充时 ，它将为返回的数据创建必要的表和列（如果它们尚不存在）。When the fills a , it creates the necessary tables and columns for the returned data if they do not already exist. 但是，除非将属性设置为，否则不会在隐式创建的架构中包含主键信息 。However, primary key information is not included in the implicitly created schema unless the property is set to . 你还可以在 使用数据填充数据之前，创建的架构（包括主键信息） `FillSchema` 。You may also have the create the schema of the , including primary key information, before filling it with data using `FillSchema`. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [将现有约束添加到数据集](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/adding-existing-constraints-to-a-dataset)。For more information, see [Adding Existing Constraints to a DataSet](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/adding-existing-constraints-to-a-dataset). 与和结合使用 ， 以提高连接到 SQL Server 数据库时的性能。 is used in conjunction with and to increase performance when connecting to a SQL Server database. > [!NOTE] > 如果您要通过 SQL Server 存储过程使用 `DataAdapter` 来编辑或删除数据，请确保不要在存储过程定义中使用 SET NOCOUNT ON。If you are using SQL Server stored procedures to edit or delete data using a `DataAdapter`, make sure that you do not use SET NOCOUNT ON in the stored procedure definition. 这将使返回的受影响的行数为零，`DataAdapter` 会将其解释为并发冲突。This causes the rows affected count returned to be zero, which the `DataAdapter` interprets as a concurrency conflict. 在这种情况下，将引发 。In this event, a will be thrown. 还包括 、、、 和属性， 以便于加载和更新数据。The also includes the , , , , and properties to facilitate the loading and updating of data. 创建的实例时 ，读/写属性将设置为初始值。When an instance of is created, the read/write properties are set to initial values. 有关这些值的列表，请参见 构造函数。For a list of these values, see the constructor. 、 和 是使用每个修改行中的单个值自动填充的通用模板，通过参数机制。The , , and are generic templates that are automatically filled with individual values from every modified row through the parameters mechanism. 对于传播到上的数据源的每个列 ，应将参数添加到 `InsertCommand` 、 `UpdateCommand` 或 `DeleteCommand` 。For every column that you propagate to the data source on , a parameter should be added to the `InsertCommand`, `UpdateCommand`, or `DeleteCommand`. 应将对象的属性 设置为列的名称。The property of the object should be set to the name of the column. 此设置指示参数的值不是手动设置的，而是从当前处理的行中的特定列获取的。This setting indicates that the value of the parameter is not set manually, but is taken from the particular column in the currently processed row. > [!NOTE] > 如果 调用了方法并且该表包含客户端计算机上不可用的用户定义类型，则会发生。An will occur if the method is called and the table contains a user-defined type that is not available on the client computer. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [CLR 用户定义类型](/sql/relational-databases/clr-integration-database-objects-user-defined-types/clr-user-defined-types)。For more information, see [CLR User-Defined Types](/sql/relational-databases/clr-integration-database-objects-user-defined-types/clr-user-defined-types). ## Examples 下面的示例使用 、 和 从数据库中选择记录，并 使用所选行填充。The following example uses the , , and to select records from a database and populate a with the selected rows. 然后返回填充的。The filled is then returned. 为实现此目的，会将方法传递给已初始化的 、连接字符串和作为 TRANSACT-SQL SELECT 语句的查询字符串。To accomplish this, the method is passed an initialized , a connection string, and a query string that is a Transact-SQL SELECT statement. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 构造函数的实现将 属性设置为参数中指定的值 `selectCommand` 。This implementation of the constructor sets the property to the value specified in the `selectCommand` parameter. 创建实例时 ，以下读/写属性将设置为以下初始值。When an instance of is created, the following read/write properties are set to the following initial values. |属性Properties|初始值Initial value| |----------------|-------------------| ||`MissingMappingAction.Passthrough`| ||`MissingSchemaAction.Add`| 可以通过单独调用属性来更改任何这些属性的值。You can change the value of any of these properties through a separate call to the property. 将 (或任何其他命令属性) 分配给之前创建的时 ， 不会克隆。When (or any of the other command properties) is assigned to a previously created , the is not cloned. 维护对先前创建的对象的引用 。The maintains a reference to the previously created object. ## Examples 下面的示例创建 并设置其一些属性。The following example creates a and sets some of its properties. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter.SqlDataAdapter1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter.SqlDataAdapter1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter.SqlDataAdapter1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter.SqlDataAdapter1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果尚未打开，则打开的此实现并关闭 。This implementation of the opens and closes a if it is not already open. 这在必须 为两个或更多对象调用方法的应用程序中非常有用 。This can be useful in an application that must call the method for two or more objects. 如果已 打开，则必须显式调用 **Close** 或 **Dispose** 才能关闭它。If the is already open, you must explicitly call **Close** or **Dispose** to close it. 创建实例时 ，以下读/写属性将设置为以下初始值。When an instance of is created, the following read/write properties are set to the following initial values. |属性Properties|初始值Initial value| |----------------|-------------------| ||`MissingMappingAction.Passthrough`| ||`MissingSchemaAction.Add`| 可以通过单独调用属性来更改其中任一属性的值。You can change the value of either of these properties through a separate call to the property. ## Examples 下面的示例创建 并设置其一些属性。The following example creates a and sets some of its properties. summary.span: 获取或设置一个 Transact-SQL 语句或存储过程，以从数据集删除记录。

span.span: Gets or sets a Transact-SQL statement or stored procedure to delete records from the data set.

value.span: 在 过程中使用 ，以在数据库中删除对应于 中已删除行的记录。

span.span: A used during to delete records in the database that correspond to deleted rows in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在过程中 ，如果未设置此属性，并且主键信息存在于中 ，则 可以在设置 属性并使用时自动生成 。During , if this property is not set and primary key information is present in the , the can be generated automatically if you set the property and use the . 然后，将生成未设置的任何其他命令 。Then, any additional commands that you do not set are generated by the . 此代逻辑要求密钥列信息存在于中 。This generation logic requires key column information to be present in the . 有关详细信息，请参阅 [通过 Commandbuilder 生成命令](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders)。For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders). 当 分配给以前创建的时 ， 不会克隆。When is assigned to a previously created , the is not cloned. 维护对先前创建的对象的引用 。The maintains a reference to the previously created object. 对于传播到上的数据源的每个列 ，应将参数添加到 `InsertCommand` 、 `UpdateCommand` 或 `DeleteCommand` 。For every column that you propagate to the data source on , a parameter should be added to the `InsertCommand`, `UpdateCommand`, or `DeleteCommand`. `SourceColumn`应将参数的属性设置为列的名称。The `SourceColumn` property of the parameter should be set to the name of the column. 这表示参数的值不是手动设置的，而是从当前处理的行中的特定列获取的。This indicates that the value of the parameter is not set manually, but is taken from the particular column in the currently processed row. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 并设置 、、 和 属性。The following example creates a and sets the , , , and properties. 假设您已经创建了一个 对象。It assumes you have already created a object. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlDataAdapter.Command#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlDataAdapter.Command/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlDataAdapter.Command#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlDataAdapter.Command/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个 Transact-SQL 语句或存储过程，以在数据源中插入新记录。

span.span: Gets or sets a Transact-SQL statement or stored procedure to insert new records into the data source.

value.span: 在 过程中使用 ，以在数据库中插入对应于 中的新行的记录。

span.span: A used during to insert records into the database that correspond to new rows in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在过程中 ，如果未设置此属性，并且主键信息存在于中 ，则 可以在设置 属性并使用时自动生成 。During , if this property is not set and primary key information is present in the , the can be generated automatically if you set the property and use the . 然后，将生成未设置的任何其他命令 。Then, any additional commands that you do not set are generated by the . 此代逻辑要求密钥列信息存在于中 。This generation logic requires key column information to be present in the . 有关详细信息，请参阅 [通过 Commandbuilder 生成命令](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders)。For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders). 当 分配给以前创建的时 ， 不会克隆。When is assigned to a previously created , the is not cloned. 维护对先前创建的对象的引用 。The maintains a reference to the previously created object. 如果执行此命令将返回行，则可以将这些行添加到中， 具体取决于如何设置对象的 **UpdatedRowSource** 属性 。If execution of this command returns rows, these rows can be added to the depending on how you set the **UpdatedRowSource** property of the object. 对于传播到上的数据源的每个列 ，应将参数添加到 `InsertCommand` 、 `UpdateCommand` 或 `DeleteCommand` 。For every column that you propagate to the data source on , a parameter should be added to `InsertCommand`, `UpdateCommand`, or `DeleteCommand`. `SourceColumn`应将参数的属性设置为列的名称。The `SourceColumn` property of the parameter should be set to the name of the column. 这表示参数的值不是手动设置的，而是从当前处理的行中的特定列获取的。This indicates that the value of the parameter is not set manually, but is taken from the particular column in the currently processed row. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 并设置 、、 和 属性。The following example creates a and sets the , , , and properties. 假设您已经创建了一个 对象。It assumes you have already created a object. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlDataAdapter.Command#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlDataAdapter.Command/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlDataAdapter.Command#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlDataAdapter.Command/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 在对数据源执行命令后的 过程中发生。

span.span: Occurs during after a command is executed against the data source.

summary.span: 尝试进行更新，因此激发了该事件。

span.span: The attempt to update is made, so the event fires.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用时 ，每个更新的数据行发生两个事件。When using , there are two events that occur per data row updated. 执行顺序如下所示：The order of execution is as follows: 1. 中的值 将被移动到参数值中。The values in the are moved to the parameter values. 2. 引发 事件。The event is raised. 3. 命令执行。The command executes. 4. 如果命令设置为，则 `FirstReturnedRecord` 返回的第一个结果位于中 。If the command is set to `FirstReturnedRecord`, the first returned result is placed in the . 5. 如果有输出参数，则将它们放在中 。If there are output parameters, they are placed in the . 6. 引发 事件。The event is raised. 7. 调用 。 is called. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何同时使用 和 事件。The following example shows how to use both the and events. 此事件返回以下输出：The event returns this output: 事件参数： (command = SqlClient commandType = 2 status = 0) event args: (command=System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand commandType=2 status=0) 此事件返回以下输出：The event returns this output: 事件参数： (command = SqlClient commandType = 2 recordsAffected = 1 row = System.object [37] status = 0) event args: (command=System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand commandType=2 recordsAffected=1 row=System.Data.DataRow[37] status=0) [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter.RowUpdated Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter.RowUpdated Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter.RowUpdated Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter.RowUpdated Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用时 ，每个更新的数据行发生两个事件。When using , there are two events that occur per data row updated. 执行顺序如下所示：The order of execution is as follows: 1. 中的值 将被移动到参数值中。The values in the are moved to the parameter values. 2. 引发 事件。The event is raised. 3. 命令执行。The command executes. 4. 如果命令设置为，则 `FirstReturnedRecord` 返回的第一个结果位于中 。If the command is set to `FirstReturnedRecord`, the first returned result is placed in the . 5. 如果有输出参数，则将它们放在中 。If there are output parameters, they are placed in the . 6. 引发 事件。The event is raised. 7. 调用 。 is called. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何同时使用 和 事件。The following example shows how to use both the and events. 此事件返回以下输出：The event returns this output: 事件参数： (command = SqlClient commandType = 2 status = 0) event args: (command=System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand commandType=2 status=0) 此事件返回以下输出：The event returns this output: 事件参数： (command = SqlClient commandType = 2 recordsAffected = 1 row = System.object [37] status = 0) event args: (command=System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand commandType=2 recordsAffected=1 row=System.Data.DataRow[37] status=0) [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter.RowUpdated Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter.RowUpdated Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter.RowUpdated Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter.RowUpdated Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

value.span: 在 过程中使用的 ，用来从数据库中为 中的位置选择记录。

span.span: A used during to select records from the database for placement in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 分配给以前创建的时 ， 不会克隆。When is assigned to a previously created , the is not cloned. 维护对先前创建的对象的引用 。The maintains a reference to the previously created object. 如果未 返回任何行，则不会向中添加任何表 ，也不会引发异常。If the does not return any rows, no tables are added to the , and no exception is raised. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 并设置 、、 和 属性。The following example creates a and sets the , , , and properties. 假设您已经创建了一个 对象。It assumes you have already created a object. public: virtual property int UpdateBatchSize { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.UpdateBatchSize : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置每次到服务器的往返过程中处理的行数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of rows that are processed in each round-trip to the server.
The number of rows to process per-batch.
Value is
Effect
There is no limit on the batch size.
Disables batch updating.

description.span: 更改是使用 操作的批处理一次性发送的。

span.span: Changes are sent using batches of operations at a time.

value.span: 将此值设置为1以外的值时，所有与关联的命令 都必须将其 **UpdatedRowSource** 属性设置为 或 。

span.span: When setting this to a value other than 1, all the commands associated with the have to have their **UpdatedRowSource** property set to or .
An exception is thrown otherwise.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 获取或设置一个值，该值启用或禁用批处理支持，并且指定可在一次批处理中执行的命令的数量。Gets or sets a value that enables or disables batch processing support, and specifies the number of commands that can be executed in a batch. 使用 属性可使用中的更改更新数据源 。Use the property to update a data source with changes from a . 这样可以减少到服务器的往返次数，从而提高应用程序的性能。This can increase application performance by reducing the number of round-trips to the server. 执行极大的批处理会降低性能。Executing an extremely large batch could decrease performance. 因此，在实现应用程序前应进行测试以得到最佳的批大小。Therefore, you should test for the optimum batch size setting before implementing your application. 如果将值设置为小于零的数字，则会引发。An is thrown if the value is set to a number less than zero.

value.span: 在 过程中使用的 ，用于在数据库中更新对应于 中已修改行的记录。

span.span: A used during to update records in the database that correspond to modified rows in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在过程中 ，如果未设置此属性，并且主键信息存在于中 ，则 可以在设置 属性并使用时自动生成 。During , if this property is not set and primary key information is present in the , the can be generated automatically if you set the property and use the . 然后，将生成未设置的任何其他命令 。Then, any additional commands that you do not set are generated by the . 此代逻辑要求密钥列信息存在于中 。This generation logic requires key column information to be present in the . 有关详细信息，请参阅 [通过 Commandbuilder 生成命令](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders)。For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders). 当 分配给以前创建的时 ， 不会克隆。When is assigned to a previously created , the is not cloned. 维护对先前创建的对象的引用 。The maintains a reference to the previously created object. > [!NOTE] > 如果执行此命令将返回行，则更新的行可能会与进行合并， 具体取决于您设置对象的 **UpdatedRowSource** 属性的方式 。If execution of this command returns rows, the updated rows may be merged with the depending on how you set the **UpdatedRowSource** property of the object. 对于传播到上的数据源的每个列 ，应将参数添加到 `InsertCommand` 、 `UpdateCommand` 或 `DeleteCommand` 。For every column that you propagate to the data source on , a parameter should be added to `InsertCommand`, `UpdateCommand`, or `DeleteCommand`. `SourceColumn`应将参数的属性设置为列的名称。The `SourceColumn` property of the parameter should be set to the name of the column. 这表示参数的值不是手动设置的，而是从当前处理的行中的特定列获取的。This indicates that the value of the parameter is not set manually, but taken from the particular column in the currently processed row. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 并设置 、 和 属性。The following example creates a and sets the , , and properties. 假设您已经创建了一个 对象。It assumes you have already created a object. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlDataAdapter.Command#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlDataAdapter.Command/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlDataAdapter.Command#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlDataAdapter.Command/VB/source.vb#1)]
